revised_title: E. W. R. Steacie's Contributions to Canadian Science and NRC
tldr: This article reviews a book about E. W. R. Steacie, a renowned Canadian scientist who played a significant role in the development of the National Research Council (NRC) of Canada. Steacie contributed to the expansion of NRC during World War II, supported the growth of Canadian scientific research, and introduced the postdoctoral fellowship program. He also faced challenges in maintaining a creative environment and promoting independent research in Canada. Steacie's leadership and scientific achievements earned him numerous honors and distinctions.
